name: Arise (itch) (Enlocke)
description:
Arise is a racing game.

Inspired by classics like Wipeout and Micro Machine, Arise is a love letter to hard and challenging games.

You will suffer and you'll ask for more.

Arise was made by :

Apollinaire Behra Lecam (Suberban_Scum on Itch)

Jarod Similia

Scotty Chouan

Bekir Kilinc ( that's me)
